traits.Charge: If the aurochs moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15+1d4 + 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.Gore: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d4 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.
